Nerangs.ab: xšnūman ān ī bēd 2 bār wizārdan ka ēzišn ī gāhānbār bēd ka yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō guft maiδiiō.zarəmiiehe raθβō ayāb ān gāh bēd aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh bēd aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe 2 bār ā.: y.: agar ardā fraward bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō tā ō ī vahmąsca .: ā y aṣ̌aōnąm frauuaṣ̌anąm ...

He should say the corrsponding šnūman twice. When the ēzišn is for gāhānbār, when he has said yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō , (he should say:) maiδiiō.zarəmiiehe raθβō or the corresponding gāh and aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corrsponding gāh aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe twice. ā.: y.: If it is (a ceremony) for ardā fraward, (he should say:) auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō until vahmąsca .: ā y aṣ̌aōnąm frauuaṣ̌anąm ... [Y23.1-3]
